ingredients.item: 100g coconut oil, melted but not hot 100g coconut milk

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180 ̊C, gas mark 4; line a 900g loaf tin with baking parchment. Beat the eggs, maple syrup, oil and milk in a jug. Mix the flour, baking powder and lime zest with a good pinch of salt in a large bowl. Make a well in the middle and stir in the wet ingredients. Pour into the tin and bake for 40 minutes.
Cool to room temperature, then slice and serve with low-sugar jam, if liked.
